A Zone-made Fannypack that helps mitigate the cargo a little, created for the need of distribute the cargo, even if it is a small pack in the belt. Can also hold a small magazine if needed. a lot of stalkers use it at a daily basis, making it easy to find.

.Adidas Fanny pack, not so different that the zone made one, but its still as popular as the local production. Like his chernobyl brother, it can hold a small magazine if needed. Popular with bandits, mercs and some loners.

A generic chinese made sidebag, made of some cheap but durable materials, found a lot in the zone and used for some cheap weight management, but this comes to a cost of being slower, more visible and more gear to get irridiated.
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Everyday item
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be worn on the belt
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dual slot item

Sometimes these supreme fanny (funny) packs make their way into the zone, maybe as a luxury item, maybe people come to the zone with it as if it was a drip contest. either way, it can hold a mag and help distributing weight but... are you sure that you want a bright red thing strapped to your body? maybe giving the enemy a free laser sight is the new drip. stop thinking about it, and be careful with that boar behind you....
